Description:
Detects suspicious parameters of fsutil (deleting USN journal, configuring it with small size, etc).
Might be used by ransomwares during the attack (seen by NotPetya and others).


Author: Ecco, E.M. Anhaus, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Fsutil Suspicious Invocation
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\fsutil.exe' and original_file_name = 'fsutil.exe') and (command like '%deletejournal%' or command like '%createjournal%' or command like '%setzerodata%'))
